title: Move Up
text: Web application that allows you to view the available physical activity classes, allows you to register, log in and in turn make reservations in the city where the class is located.

title: To Do List
text: To do list, it's a project where user can add, remove, mark as done when desired, in addition, the lastest result of your interaction is save in the browser.

title: Music Keyword
text: This is a project that produces a different sound for each key the user presses.

title: Geometric Calculator
text: This project is about choosing a geometric figure of which you want to calculate the area or perimeter.

title: Math Poject
text: Choose the value to calculate mode, median, average and discounts.

title: Draw Arrow
text: Draw arrow is about making a drawing with the keyboard arrows on a canvas starting from a fixed point.
